overview:
This is Lynn with three years experience of foreign trade in Guangzhou, China,Now work as a freelance interpreter with partner.

We have the experience of being with customers to visit the factory, attend the Fair, do the shopping, check the wholesale market and so on.

Our basic services are: 1) Interpreter & translator in Guangzhou 2) Transportation arrangement, such as hotel reservation, book airplane tickets, guide for personal shopping, guide for tour. 3) Guide for business to the wholesale markets and manufactories, negotiate good prices with suppliers. 4) Business assistant, such as inspection, shipment, arrangement, handling export procedure, make and post shipment documents to buyers. 5) Source new products and suppliers.

More services pls check our website www.travel-in-gz.com.
We are not only want to be your professional personal interpreter, travel guider, business assistant, sourcing agent but also want to be your best friends, trustful business partner.
